name: src/group.mjs
Group
description:
A class that groups elements together and allow them to act as one.
Represents a group of elements with chainable operations.

name: collectionWeakMap
description: Weakmap to track data belonging to elements used in this module.

name: storedIDs
description: Array of stored IDs so that multiple of the same ID cannot be claimed

params.name: pCollection
params.description: The initial collection to be grouped.

params.name: pMethods
params.description: An object containing methods to attach to this group.

name: generateID
description:
Generates a random ID based on the specified length and ensures its uniqueness
within the stored IDs.

params.name: pID
params.description: The length of the generated ID.

params.name: pCollection
params.description: The initial collection to be grouped.

params.name: pMethods
params.description: An object containing methods to attach to this group.

name: map
description: Applies a function to each element in the group.

unknown.tagValue: {Group} The current Group instance for chaining.

params.name: pCallback
params.description: The function to apply to each element.

return.description: The current Group instance for chaining.

name: forEach
description: Iterates over each element in the group.

unknown.tagValue: {Group} The current Group instance for chaining.

params.name: pCallback
params.description: The function to execute for each element.

return.description: The current Group instance for chaining.

name: toArray
description: Converts the group to a new array.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} A shallow copy of the current collection.

return.description: A shallow copy of the current collection.

name: add
description: Adds an item to the group if it doesn't already exist.

unknown.tagValue: {Group} The current Group instance for chaining.

params.name: pItem
params.description: The item to add to the group.

return.description: The current Group instance for chaining.

name: remove
description: Removes an item from the group if it exists.

unknown.tagValue: {Group} The current Group instance for chaining.

params.name: pItem
params.description: The item to remove from the group.

return.description: The current Group instance for chaining.

name: attachMethod
description: Attaches a method to the group, allowing it to be called on the group to execute the method on each element.

unknown.tagValue: {Group} The current Group instance for chaining.

params.name: pMethodName
params.description: The name of the method to attach.

return.description: The current Group instance for chaining.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "group",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "The Group module is a powerful utility designed to simplify the manipulation of collections in JavaScript. It enables you to treat a set of elements as a single unit, allowing you to perform actions on the entire group without the need for cumbersome loops.",
  "main": "dist/group.min.mjs",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "build": "npx webpack && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js",
    "build:minify": "uglifyjs dist/group.min.mjs -m -c --comments -o dist/group.min.mjs",
    "build:prod": "npx webpack --mode production && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js && npm run build:docs",
    "build:docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "https://github.com/doubleactii",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE.md",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/EvitcaStudio/Group.git"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "uglify-js": "^3.17.4",
    "webpack": "^5.89.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^5.1.4"
  }
}
name: package.json
